metadata.dc:author: Barrio, J
de Diego Lorenzo, A
García Sánchez, A
Clemente, G
Bañares, R
Catalina, V
metadata.dc:description: We present a 35 years-old man with fever related leishmania infection as the first complication of a previously undiagnosed cirrhosis. Diagnosis of leishmaniasis is often complicated. Clinical and therapeutical aspects are commented.
metadata.dc:title: Leishmaniasis en paciente con cirrosis hepática.
[Leishmaniasis in a patient with liver cirrhosis].
